name: transition
description: GOV.UK application to manage the transition of websites to GOV.UK
author: Government Digital Service

scripts.jasmine:prepare: RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails assets:clobber assets:precompile
scripts.jasmine:ci: yarn run jasmine:prepare && yarn run jasmine-browser-runner runSpecs
scripts.jasmine:browser: yarn run jasmine:prepare && yarn run jasmine-browser-runner
